parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swSelectType_e

title: ICompositeCurveFeatureData.GetEntitiesToJoin
description: Gets the entities to join to create this composite curve feature.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swSelectType_e

remarks:
The entities can be edges, reference curves other than composite curves, projection curves, and sketch entities.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
